posts.post_title: [ALL SOLD] PSA Graded T206 Piedmont 460 Factory 42s
posts.post_content:
I'm brokering these cards from the recent North Carolina find. To note, the 
gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will also handle the shipping (w/ insurance included), although I completely stand behind any transaction(s).

Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Offers welcome.

Red Cobb PSA 3, Willetts PSA 6.5, and more...

Prices and scans here:
ALL SOLD

Thank you for looking!

Hi Trae
email on the way.

Thanks
Mike
